main event: A witness observed a white and red-orange object that suddenly went straight up and came down again over a 60-second period.
interesting points: The object was initially thought to be a star before it exhibited the sudden vertical movement.
The object was observed for about 5 minutes before disappearing.
The report concludes the object was a balloon, possibly a balloon.
Additional letters indicate the witness was interested in obtaining information and films related to UFO investigations and 'Project Blue Book'.
The witness had seen a TV movie about UFOs and wanted to learn more about the topic.
photographs: yes, report indicates photos were taken but not provided
